title: RADS Error
body: Hi all, I've been getting a RADS error on and off again for the last week or so, occasionally it'll fix itself for a day or so and then start messing up again. I've tried all the recommended solutions: switching to Google DNS, disabling firewall and antivirus, running as admin, deleting files in projects etc. and nothing seems to help at all. If anyone has encountered this error and found a solution, please help, this is extremely annoying. Also, I've submitted a ticket but the guy just keeps telling me to do the same things even though I've said they don't work.

replies.body: I see that you're already speaking with a specialist in your ticket and updated today.  They'll be able to continue helping out with your specific issue individually!
Reopen the ticket and make it clear to the Support Specialist that you've already tried that solution and you require another more advanced solution.
